page.title: 11AN INTERVIEW WITH A COMMUTER
page.content: COMMUTER SERVICE _ AN INTERVIEW "WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE SERVICE PROVIDED?" "REASONABLE. HOWEVER,THEY ARE NOT ABLE TO COPE WITH THE COMMON PLACE PROBLEMS AND COMMUNICATIONS ARE INADEQUATE." 2)"WHICH TIME OF YEAR DO YOU FIND IT BEST/WORST TO TRAVEL?""SUMMER IS THE BEST TIME TO TRAVEL ,ALTHOUGH IT DOES TEND TO BE CROWDED.IN WINTER WE HAVE PROBLEMS WITH LEAVES ON THE LINE".3)"WHICH TRAIN DO YOU CATCH?"THE 8.05 A.M. AND THE 5.17P.M."4)"DO YOU FIND SEATING A PROBLEM?""NO" 5)"WHAT ARE THE FREQUANCY OF THE TRAINS?""4FAST TRAINS PER HOURDURING RUSH HOURS AND 3 FAST TRAINS THEREAFTER."6)"DO YOU HAVE TO CHANGE TRAIN?""NO"7)"HOW WOULD YOU GET TO WORK IF YOU DID NOT GO BY TRAIN?""CAR ,COACH OR BUS."8)"DO YOU FIND IT EXPENSIVE TO TRAVEL BY TRAIN?""YES,PRICES HAVE SOARED."
